comments.body: "devicelab" (a.k.a. "cocoon") is our test lab where we test Flutter on physical devices. There's only one devicelab. I clarified at the top what it is.

**Task is flaky** (yellow): the task was attempted multiple time, but only the
latest attempt succeeded (we currently only try twice).

comments.body: I presume it's not easily possible to tell if a task is being skipped rather than just hasn't started yet?

If it's skipped intentionally it will have no color at all; the table cell will look as if missing. If the task is _meant_ to run but is skipped due to some infrastructure peculiarities then yeah, it will simply remain as "New".
